sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>incident</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Field Stamping Recommendations</name> <order>200</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var result = sn_rf.RecommendationFramework.getStampRecommendations(current); if (result.status == 'success') { var recommendations = result.recommendations; for (var idx = 0; idx < recommendations.length; idx++) { var recommendation = recommendations[idx]; var isConfident = recommendation.isConfident; var fieldName = recommendation.fieldName; var currentValue = current.getValue(fieldName); if (isConfident && currentValue == null) { var recommendedValue = recommendation.fieldValue; current.setValue(fieldName, recommendedValue); } } } else { gs.info('getStampRecommendations API failed in Field Stamping Recommendations: ' + result.errorMessage); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-04 12:01:19</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1074c2da533001107234ddeeff7b1240</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Field Stamping Recommendations</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Recommendations for Incident Management" source="sn_sow_incident_rf">ebe2f8623d644110f87716f58429c7f2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Recommendations for Incident Management">ebe2f8623d644110f87716f58429c7f2</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1074c2da533001107234ddeeff7b1240</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-05 14:11:16</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1074c2da533001107234ddeeff7b1240"/> </record_update>
